groups:concept.deftn: educational content standards for science and geography

outline.groups:deftn: NSES represents the National Science Education Standards
Pertains to content for kindergarten through 4th grade
Empahsizes conceptual and procedural schemes that unify science disciplines

outline.groups:vocab: NSES:K-4:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Change, constancy, and measurement
NSES:K-4:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Evidence, models, and explanation
NSES:K-4:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Evolution and equilibrium
NSES:K-4:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Form and function
NSES:K-4:Unifying Concepts and Processes Standards:Systems, order, and organization

outline.groups:deftn: The combination of the processes of science, scientific knowledge and reasoning to understand science

outline.groups:vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard A Science as Inquiry Standards:Abilities necessary to do scientific inquiry
outline.text: Abilities necessary to do scientific inquiry

outline.groups:vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard A Science as Inquiry Standards:Understanding about scientific inquiry

outline.groups:deftn: Encompasses the subject matter, facts, concepts, principls, theories and models of physical science

outline.groups:vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Light, heat, electricity, and magnetism
NSES:K-4:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Position and motion of objects
NSES:K-4:Content Standard B Physical Science Standards:Properties of objects and materials

outline.groups:deftn: Encompasses the subject matter, facts, concepts, principls, theories and models of life science

outline.groups:vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Characteristics of organisms
NSES:K-4:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Life cycles of organisms
NSES:K-4:Content Standard C Life Science Standards:Organisms and environments

outline.groups:deftn: Encompasses the subject matter, facts, concepts, principls, theories and models of Earth and space science

outline.groups:vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Changes in earth and sky
NSES:K-4:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Objects in the sky
NSES:K-4:Content Standard D Earth and Space Science Standards:Properties of earth materials

outline.groups:deftn: Establish connections between the natural and designed worlds and provide opportunities to develop decision-making abilities

outline.groups:vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard E Science and Technology Standards:Abilities of technological design
NSES:K-4:Content Standard E Science and Technology Standards:Abilities to distinguish between natural objects and objects made by humans
outline.text: Abilities to distinguish between natural objects and objects made by humans
outline.groups:textFull: Abilities to distinguish between natural objects and objects made by humans

outline.groups:vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard E Science and Technology Standards:Understanding about science and technology
outline.groups:textFull: Understanding about science and technology

outline.text: F - Science in personal / social perspectives
outline.groups:deftn: Develop decision-making skills in relation to personal social issues

outline.groups:textFull: Science and technology in local challenges

outline.groups:vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard F Science in Personal and Social Perspectives Standards:Types of resources

outline.text: G - History and nature of science
outline.groups:deftn: Emphasizes the clarification of different aspects of scientific inquiry, the human aspects of science, and the role that science has played in the development of various cultures

outline.groups:vocab: NSES:K-4:Content Standard G History and Nature of Science Standards:Science as a human endeavor
